citations.narrative:
One macaque sustained an injury to his hand requiring amputation of several digits when a guillotine door fell on his hand
during shifting for routine enclosure sanitation. The caretaker lost grip on the door causing it to fall on the animal’s hand.
Handling of animals shall be done as expeditiously and carefully as possible so as not to cause physical harm. Corrective
measures have been instituted and include installing a portable pully system for the guillotine doors in this animal holding
area ,training care staff on its use and revising the SOP for moving alert non human primates . CORRECTED AT TIME
OF INSPECTION 5/1/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees .
n

during shifting for routine enclosure sanitation. The caretaker lost grip on the door causing it to fall on the animal’s hand. 
Handling of animals shall be done as expeditiously and carefully as possible so as not to cause physical harm. Corrective
